/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is flanked by a variety of buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the busy scene below. Power lines crisscross above the street, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of modernity to the scene. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the city.
